AddSmsSign.document:
This API is used to add an SMS signature. Please read the [Tencent Cloud SMS Signature Review Standards](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/382/39022?from_cn_redirect=1) before starting an application.
> Note: individual users cannot use this API to apply for SMS signatures. For more information, please see [Identity Verification Overview](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/378/3629?from_cn_redirect=1). If your account identity is individual, please log in to the console to apply for SMS signatures. For detailed directions, please see [Creating SMS Signatures](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/382/36136?from_cn_redirect=1#Sign).
AddSmsSign.name: Adds SMS signature

AddSmsTemplate.document:
This API is used to add an SMS template. Please read the [Tencent Cloud SMS Body Template Review Standards](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/382/39023?from_cn_redirect=1) before starting an application.
> Note: individual users cannot use this API to apply for SMS body templates. For more information, please see [Identity Verification Overview](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/378/3629?from_cn_redirect=1). If your account identity is individual, please log in to the console to apply for SMS body templates. For detailed directions, please see [Creating SMS Body Templates](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/382/36136?from_cn_redirect=1#Template).
AddSmsTemplate.name: Adds SMS template

CallbackStatusStatistics.document: This API is used to collect statistics on user receipts.
CallbackStatusStatistics.name: Collects statistics on receipts

DeleteSmsSign.document: > Note: individual users cannot use this API to delete SMS signatures. For more information, please see [Identity Verification Overview](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/378/3629?from_cn_redirect=1). You can log in to the console to delete SMS signatures. For detailed directions, please see the notes on deleting SMS signatures in [SMS Signature Operations](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/382/36136?from_cn_redirect=1#Sign).
DeleteSmsSign.name: Deletes SMS signature

DeleteSmsTemplate.document: > Note: individual users cannot use this API to delete SMS body templates. For more information, please see [Identity Verification Overview](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/378/3629?from_cn_redirect=1). You can log in to the console to delete SMS body templates. For detailed directions, please see the notes on deleting SMS body templates in [SMS Body Template Operations](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/382/36136?from_cn_redirect=1#Template).
DeleteSmsTemplate.name: Deletes SMS template

DescribeSmsSignList.document: > Note: individual users cannot use this API to query SMS signatures. For more information, please see [Identity Verification Overview](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/378/3629?from_cn_redirect=1).
DescribeSmsSignList.name: Queries SMS signature status

DescribeSmsTemplateList.document: > Note: individual users cannot use this API to query SMS body templates. For more information, please see [Identity Verification Overview](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/378/3629?from_cn_redirect=1).
DescribeSmsTemplateList.name: Queries SMS template status

ModifySmsSign.document:
This API is used to modify an SMS signature. Please read the [Tencent Cloud SMS Signature Review Standards](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/382/39022?from_cn_redirect=1) before making a modification.
>-  Note: individual users cannot use this API to modify SMS signatures. For more information, please see [Identity Verification Overview](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/378/3629?from_cn_redirect=1). If your account identity is individual, you can log in to the console to modify SMS signatures.
>- Modifications can be made only if the signature status is **pending review** or **rejected**. **Approved** signatures cannot be modified.
ModifySmsSign.name: Modifies SMS signature

ModifySmsTemplate.document:
This API is used to modify an SMS body template. Please read the [Tencent Cloud SMS Body Template Review Standards](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/382/39023?from_cn_redirect=1) before making a modification.
>-  Note: individual users cannot use this API to modify SMS body templates. For more information, please see [Identity Verification Overview](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/378/3629?from_cn_redirect=1). If your account identity is individual, you can log in to the console to modify SMS body templates.
>- Modifications can be made only if the body template status is **pending review** or **rejected**. **Approved** body templates cannot be modified.
ModifySmsTemplate.name: Modifies SMS template

PullSmsReplyStatus.document: This API is used to pull SMS reply status.
PullSmsReplyStatus.name: Pulls SMS reply status

PullSmsReplyStatusByPhoneNumber.document: This API is used to pull SMS reply status for one single number.
PullSmsReplyStatusByPhoneNumber.name: Pulls SMS reply status for one single number

PullSmsSendStatus.document: This API is used to pull SMS delivery status.
PullSmsSendStatus.name: Pulls SMS delivery status

PullSmsSendStatusByPhoneNumber.document: This API is used to pull SMS delivery status for one single number.
PullSmsSendStatusByPhoneNumber.name: Pulls SMS delivery status for one single number

SendSms.document: This API is used to send SMS verification codes, notification, or marketing messages to users.
SendSms.name: Sends SMS

SendStatusStatistics.document: This API is used to collect statistics on SMS sent by users.
SendStatusStatistics.name: Collects statistics on SMS sending

SmsPackagesStatistics.document: This API is used to collect statistics on user's packages.
SmsPackagesStatistics.name: Collects statistics on packages

members.document: Signature ID.
members.name: SignId

members.document: Signature application ID.
members.name: SignApplyId

members.document: Signature name.
members.name: SignName

members.document:
Signature type. Each of these types is followed by their `DocumentType` (identity document type) option:
0: company (0, 1, 2, 3).
1: app (0, 1, 2, 3, 4).
2: website (0, 1, 2, 3, 5).
3: WeChat Official Account or WeChat Mini Program (0, 1, 2, 3, 6).
4: trademark (7).
5: governmental/public institution or others (2, 3).
Note: the identity document type must be selected according to the correspondence; otherwise, the review will fail.
members.name: SignType

members.document:
Identity document type:
0: 3-in-1 license.
1: business license.
2: organization code certificate.
3: certificate of unified social credit code.
4: screenshot of application backend management (for personal app).
5: screenshot of website ICP filing backend (for personal website).
6: screenshot of WeChat Mini Program settings page (for personal WeChat Mini Program).
7: trademark registration certificate.
members.name: DocumentType

members.document:
Whether it is Global SMS:
0: Mainland China SMS.
1: Global SMS.
members.name: International

members.document:
Signature use:
0: for self-use.
1: for others.
members.name: UsedMethod

members.document: You should Base64-encode the image of the identity document corresponding to the signature first, remove the prefix `data:image/jpeg;base64,` from the resulted string, and then use it as the value of this parameter.
members.name: ProofImage

members.document:
Authorization letter, which should be submitted if `UsedMethod` is for others.
You should Base64-encode the image first, remove the prefix `data:image/jpeg;base64,` from the resulted string, and then use it as the value of this parameter.
Note: this field will take effect only when `UsedMethod` is 1 (for others).
members.name: CommissionImage

members.document:
Target mobile number in the e.164 standard in the format of +[country/region code][mobile number]. Up to 200 mobile numbers are supported in one request (which should be all Mainland China mobile numbers or all global mobile numbers).
Example: +8613711112222, which has a + sign followed by 86 (country/region code) and then by 13711112222 (mobile number).
members.name: PhoneNumberSet

members.document: Template ID. You must enter the ID of an approved template, which can be viewed in the [SMS Console](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/sms/smslist).
members.name: TemplateID

members.document: SMS `SdkAppid` actually generated after an application is added in the [SMS Console](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/sms/smslist), such as 1400006666.
members.name: SmsSdkAppid

members.document: The content of SMS signature should be encoded in UTF-8. You must enter an approved signature, which can be viewed in the [SMS Console](https://console.cloud.tencent.com/sms/smslist). Note: this parameter is required for Mainland China SMS.
members.name: Sign

members.document: Template parameter. If there is no template parameter, leave this parameter blank.
members.name: TemplateParamSet

members.document: SMS code number extension, which is not activated by default. If you need to activate it, please contact [SMS Helper](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/382/3773?from_cn_redirect=1).
members.name: ExtendCode

members.document: User session content, which can carry context information such as user-side ID and will be returned as-is by the server.
members.name: SessionContext

members.document: `senderid` for Global SMS, which is not activated by default. If you need to activate it, please contact [SMS Helper](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/382/3773?from_cn_redirect=1) for assistance. This parameter should be empty for Mainland China SMS.
members.name: SenderId

members.name: IsoCode

members.document: Billable SMS message quantity; for example, in 100 successfully submitted SMS messages, if 20 are long messages (over 80 characters) and split into two messages each, then the billable quantity will be 80 * 1 + 20 * 2 = 120.
